product-blurb.prompt: Write a short (40–80 words) product blurb for '{{title}}'. Tone: Starstuck Lab persona — dry, slightly nihilistic, witty. Include a single 'What's included' sentence. Output plain text only.

telescope-blurb.prompt: Describe '{{title}}' in 40–80 words as slightly mythic but technical; include a short 'What's included' clause.

weather-quick.prompt: Short (25–50 words) blurb for '{{title}}' with a skeptical, witty tone.

_default.prompt: Write a short product blurb for '{{title}}'.
